overview.challenge: Koko is an AI-powered peer platform bringing help into the social spaces where people already are. The platform needed to feel human, empathetic, and always accessible.
overview.solution: Designed a comprehensive user experience that prioritizes emotional intelligence and accessibility. Created intuitive interactions that balance AI capabilities with human connection, focusing on making help feel natural within social contexts.
overview.impact: Established Koko as a leader in AI-driven peer support, with a platform that users describe as feeling genuinely empathetic and supportive.

slides.title: Koko AI
slides.description:
Millions of young people struggle with anxiety and depression without support. Koko brings help into the spaces they already use. It is a peer to peer platform enhanced by AI to make support feel empathetic, human, and close at hand.

Creative Direction with a thoughtful blend of technology and care.
